product_name: Cannondale Slice Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A sleeveless cycling jersey for long rides in warm weather, the men's Cannondale Slice Bike jersey cools you down with high-performance fabric and keeps your fuel accessible with 2 mesh side pockets. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps keep skin dry to boost comfort on warm days. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Jersey features a deep front zipper for instant ventilation; mesh pockets are sized for energy gels. The men's Cannondale Slice jersey offers a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: A sleeveless cycling jersey for long rides in warm weather, the men's Cannondale Slice Bike jersey cools you down with high-performance fabric and keeps your fuel accessible with 2 mesh side pockets.
